name: OVERWORLD (TobyIsAwesome)
description:
Information

The world of Overworld is big and expansive, and riddled with lots and lots of monsters! Find 3 bosses and take them down with your own weapon!

Obligitary instructions

Left and right arrows to turn

Up and down arrows to run forwards and backwards

Spacebar to shoot

Hold down i to see your inventory

N to go to he next weapon, B to go to the previous

C to change your characters look

Rifles auto-fire, which can be toggled by pressing spacebar
